There's a major problem with the quality of the songs. It is 320kbps, but it was resampled from mostly mono audio. Mono audio means that all of the sound channels were dumped into one central channel. In normal stereo we hear everything being sample into Left and Right channels. In most of these songs the audio was sampled in mono. Hope this helps the misunderstanding. If you don't get it then check iTunes and listen to the version they have there which is sampled in stereo.

Do what @minijigga says about the songs on iTunes. The problem with these tracks is that they are mostly sampled in mono (everything is mixed into ONE central channel which makes the song sound overcompressed), some of the tracks are sampled normally in stereo (everything is mixed into two channels; left and right). You won't notice it through normal speakers, the best way is to use headphones.

-Cheers
